job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Rabobank is looking for a senior Database Engineer, with proven experience in working in complex environments, who is primarily responsible for delivering Database Services to multiple internal stakeholders. Our Database Services focuses on both on premises and cloud platforms, and includes operational responsibility for databases of business critical applications.
       You and your job
       As senior Database Engineer you are part of Squad FCTB (Fast and Close To Brilliant), delivering Database Services. This squad is part of Area DMT (Data Modernization and Transformation) within tribe DAPT (Data and Analytics Products and Transformation). You provide technical expertise for Oracle and cloud database systems and solutions. By doing so you identify solutions and improve the quality of service while providing support to application teams using these databases.
       You participate in the development and maintenance of strategic, architectural and tactical plans for the database and data warehouse environments; be conversant with, and cognizant of, the future direction of systems, how that direction impacts the company and how future and current database systems can be exploited for the company's benefit.
       We work according to Agile principles. As part of the FCTB team you work in 2 week sprints, facilitated by a scrum master. Primary goal is to deliver, optimize and extend Database Services, based on customer demand and organisation strategy. Delivering 24/7 support is part of the job.
       Top responsibilities Tech4D&A
       Within the CITO division Engineering & Data Tech, the domain Tech4D&A is the main driver behind the data driven objectives, and enabler of the most strategic objectives of Rabobank. The objectives of Tech4D&A are:
          + Delivery of platforms and standardised services, these have a Rabobank wide impact;
          + Set up of sustainable and standardised data and analytics products;
          + Maintenance of data warehousing and database environments for corporate purposes;
          + Setting standards, way of working and other deliverables for building the data driven together with the tribe DAPT.
       About Rabobank
       'Creating a better world together', this characterizes the Rabobank. Rabobank makes a difference for its more than 7 million customers in 40 countries by stimulating innovations in financial services. So that all its customers can arrange their financial affairs optimally at any time. But that is certainly not the only thing. Rabobank is a cooperative bank with a mission. Together with customers, members and partners, Rabobank is committed to a stronger living environment and to the major social challenges of today. This is based on the principle that more can be achieved together than alone. This mission can only be fulfilled because Rabobank is a powerful bank that works efficiently. In addition, Rabobank is actively involved in many social initiatives. Part of the profit is invested in society. Further afield, by ensuring that farmers receive a fair price for their products. And close by, by making neighbourhoods better together throughout the
       Netherlands. For example, about 1250 organizations in sports and culture that are a second home for many people are supported. In order to continue to achieve its core task, Rabobank has drawn up an ambitious strategic plan in which further Digitization and Data are important pillars.
job_details.full_text:
OPS Engineer

Rabobank is looking for a senior Database Engineer, with proven experience in working in complex environments, who is primarily responsible for delivering Database Services to multiple internal stakeholders. Our Database Services focuses on both on premises and cloud platforms, and includes operational responsibility for databases of business critical applications.
       You and your job
       As senior Database Engineer you are part of Squad FCTB (Fast and Close To Brilliant), delivering Database Services. This squad is part of Area DMT (Data Modernization and Transformation) within tribe DAPT (Data and Analytics Products and Transformation). You provide technical expertise for Oracle and cloud database systems and solutions. By doing so you identify solutions and improve the quality of service while providing support to application teams using these databases.
       You participate in the development and maintenance of strategic, architectural and tactical plans for the database and data warehouse environments; be conversant with, and cognizant of, the future direction of systems, how that direction impacts the company and how future and current database systems can be exploited for the company's benefit.
       We work according to Agile principles. As part of the FCTB team you work in 2 week sprints, facilitated by a scrum master. Primary goal is to deliver, optimize and extend Database Services, based on customer demand and organisation strategy. Delivering 24/7 support is part of the job.
       Top responsibilities Tech4D&A
       Within the CITO division Engineering & Data Tech, the domain Tech4D&A is the main driver behind the data driven objectives, and enabler of the most strategic objectives of Rabobank. The objectives of Tech4D&A are:
          + Delivery of platforms and standardised services, these have a Rabobank wide impact;
          + Set up of sustainable and standardised data and analytics products;
          + Maintenance of data warehousing and database environments for corporate purposes;
          + Setting standards, way of working and other deliverables for building the data driven together with the tribe DAPT.
       About Rabobank
       'Creating a better world together', this characterizes the Rabobank. Rabobank makes a difference for its more than 7 million customers in 40 countries by stimulating innovations in financial services. So that all its customers can arrange their financial affairs optimally at any time. But that is certainly not the only thing. Rabobank is a cooperative bank with a mission. Together with customers, members and partners, Rabobank is committed to a stronger living environment and to the major social challenges of today. This is based on the principle that more can be achieved together than alone. This mission can only be fulfilled because Rabobank is a powerful bank that works efficiently. In addition, Rabobank is actively involved in many social initiatives. Part of the profit is invested in society. Further afield, by ensuring that farmers receive a fair price for their products. And close by, by making neighbourhoods better together throughout the
       Netherlands. For example, about 1250 organizations in sports and culture that are a second home for many people are supported. In order to continue to achieve its core task, Rabobank has drawn up an ambitious strategic plan in which further Digitization and Data are important pillars.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional database engineering, data warehousing, and operational support for these systems. While it mentions data modernization and transformation, it lacks specific details or requirements related to machine learning, generative AI, or advanced AI model development, which are central to the ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles.

phrases.phrase: delivering Database Services to multiple internal stakeholders
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of providing services to meet the needs of internal business units.

phrases.phrase: identify solutions and improve the quality of service
phrases.justification: This implies understanding business needs and translating them into technical improvements.

phrases.phrase: be conversant with, and cognizant of, the future direction of systems, how that direction impacts the company and how future and current database systems can be exploited for the company's benefit.
phrases.justification: This directly relates to understanding the strategic impact of technology on the business.

phrases.phrase: Primary goal is to deliver, optimize and extend Database Services, based on customer demand and organisation strategy.
phrases.justification: This highlights aligning technical delivery with business strategy and customer needs.

phrases.phrase: the main driver behind the data driven objectives, and enabler of the most strategic objectives of Rabobank.
phrases.justification: This shows the role's connection to overarching business objectives.

phrases.phrase: Delivery of platforms and standardised services, these have a Rabobank wide impact
phrases.justification: This indicates understanding the broad business impact of delivered services.

phrases.phrase: Set up of sustainable and standardised data and analytics products
phrases.justification: This implies understanding the business value and strategic importance of data products.

phrases.phrase: Setting standards, way of working and other deliverables for building the data driven together with the tribe DAPT.
phrases.justification: This shows involvement in defining how technology supports business goals.
This role is fundamentally about managing and engineering database systems, which is a core component of data engineering.

phrases.phrase: operational responsibility for databases of business critical applications
phrases.justification: This involves managing the infrastructure and pipelines for data storage and access.

phrases.phrase: provide technical expertise for Oracle and cloud database systems and solutions
phrases.justification: This requires designing, building, and maintaining database infrastructure.

phrases.phrase: participate in the development and maintenance of strategic, architectural and tactical plans for the database and data warehouse environments
phrases.justification: This involves planning and building the infrastructure for data storage and retrieval.

phrases.phrase: Maintenance of data warehousing and database environments for corporate purposes
phrases.justification: This is a direct responsibility for maintaining data infrastructure.

job_tasks.justification: No specific mention of creating, training, or adapting machine learning or generative models.

phrases.justification: While not traditional application development, delivering services implies building and maintaining systems that provide functionality.

phrases.phrase: develop and maintain strategic, architectural and tactical plans for the database and data warehouse environments
phrases.justification: This involves the design and implementation of database systems, which can be considered a form of software development in the context of data infrastructure.

job_tasks.justification: The focus is on database systems and infrastructure rather than user-facing applications or AI model integration.

phrases.justification: The job title itself suggests a focus on operations.

phrases.phrase: operational responsibility for databases of business critical applications
phrases.justification: This is a core aspect of operations engineering, ensuring systems are running and maintained.

phrases.phrase: Delivering 24/7 support is part of the job.
phrases.justification: This is a clear indicator of operational responsibilities, ensuring continuous service availability.

phrases.phrase: Maintenance of data warehousing and database environments
phrases.justification: Maintenance is a key component of operations engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The role has significant operational responsibilities for database systems, including 24/7 support and maintenance.

soft_skills.skill: proven experience in working in complex environments
participate in the development and maintenance of strategic, architectural and tactical plans
work in 2 week sprints, facilitated by a scrum master
